data.message: I want to know the story behind the line you said in the song "Best Friend" with Yelawolf. It was one of the deepest verses I've heard. You said "Dog I'm the truth. Like Biggie rockin with Tupac in a suit. Taking to Proof, while droppin a duece. Fill up the syllable clip like a refillable script, cock, and I shoot." That's line alone was enough to put you in the Rap History Books, as if you weren't in them already. Lol
